Usage example

Example of lpFocusId directive:


                    <input class="form-control input-sm" lp-focus-id="{{mainCtrl.field1}}" type="text" />
                    <button class="btn btn-default btn-sm" ng-click="mainCtrl.setFocus1()">Set focus</button>

Example of lpFocusOn directive:


                    <div class="panel-body" tabindex="-1" lp-focus-on="lp.login-multifactor.errors">
                        <p>Set focus on this container.</p>
                        <button class="btn btn-default btn-sm" ng-click="mainCtrl.setFocus2()">Set focus</button>
                    </div>

Set focus on this container.
